alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Tooele County through 415 PM MDT... At 331 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms 10 miles west of Utah Test and Training Range South, or 26 miles southeast of Wendover, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds can blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Knolls, Clive, Utah Test and Training Range South and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 11 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
